context.name: Lyman Powder Measure Stand
context.excerpt: With the Lyman Powder Measure Stand, you can position your Powder Measure for maximum convenience.
context.content:
With the Lyman Powder Measure Stand, you can position your Powder Measure for maximum convenience. Features the standard 7/8‚Äù x 14 thread and will raise any measure high enough to easily position cases beneath the powder drop tube. Bolts firmly to the loading bench.

 

Lyman Powder Measure Stand Features:

Position your powder measure for maximum convenience
Easily position cases beneath the powder drop tube
Bolts firmly to the loading bench
Standard 7/8" x 14 thread adapter available separately
